languages.text: "Наконец-то кукловод решил{mf||а} предстать предо мной. Каково тебе смотреть в лицо последним верным сыновьям и дщерям Империума? Не отвечай, я вижу снедающие тебя злобу и корысть насквозь".

"At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."
languages.original_text: "Наконец-то кукловод решил{mf||а} предстать предо мной. Каково тебе смотреть в лицо последним верным сыновьям и дщерям Империума? Не отвечай, я вижу снедающие тебя злобу и корысть насквозь".

traits.locale_text: "At last the puppetmaster decided to face me. How does it feel, looking into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can clearly see the hate and greed eating you inside."

"At last the puppetmaster decided to face me. How does it feel, looking into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can clearly see the hate and greed eating you inside."

"At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

languages.text: «Por fin {mf|el|la} titiriter{mf|o|a} decide enfrentarse a mí. ¿Qué se siente al mirar a los ojos a los últimos hijos e hijas leales del Imperium? No tiene que responder. Veo el odio y la codicia ardiendo en su interior».
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin {mf|el|la} titiriter{mf|o|a} decide enfrentarse a mí. ¿Qué se siente al mirar a los ojos a los últimos hijos e hijas leales del Imperium? No tiene que responder. Veo el odio y la codicia ardiendo en su interior».

languages.text: “啊，提线木偶的主人终于愿意面对我了。你眼前这些人，是帝国最后的忠诚儿女。直视我们的眼睛是什么感觉？不必回答，我看得出来，怒火与贪婪正在吞噬你的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: “啊，提线木偶的主人终于愿意面对我了。你眼前这些人，是帝国最后的忠诚儿女。直视我们的眼睛是什么感觉？不必回答，我看得出来，怒火与贪婪正在吞噬你的灵魂。”

languages.text: 「ついに、黒幕が俺に会いに来ることを決めたのか。帝国に忠実な最後の息子や娘たちをその目に見るのはどんな感じだい？答えなくていい。俺にはあらゆる憎悪と欲望が見える」
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: 「ついに、黒幕が俺に会いに来ることを決めたのか。帝国に忠実な最後の息子や娘たちをその目に見るのはどんな感じだい？答えなくていい。俺にはあらゆる憎悪と欲望が見える」

languages.text: « L'éminence grise qui tire les ficelles depuis le début se décide enfin à me rencontrer face à face. Alors, qu'est-ce que ça fait de regarder dans les yeux les derniers fils et filles restés fidèles à l'Imperium ? Inutile de répondre. Je vois d'ici toute la haine et l'avidité qui vous rongent de l'intérieur. »
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: « L'éminence grise qui tire les ficelles depuis le début se décide enfin à me rencontrer face à face. Alors, qu'est-ce que ça fait de regarder dans les yeux les derniers fils et filles restés fidèles à l'Imperium ? Inutile de répondre. Je vois d'ici toute la haine et l'avidité qui vous rongent de l'intérieur. »

languages.text: "Kukla ustası nihayet karşıma çıkmaya karar verdi demek. İmparatorluk'un son sadık oğul ve kızlarının gözlerinin içine bakmak nasıl bir duygu? Cevap verme. İçini kemiren tüm o nefreti ve hırsı görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: "Kukla ustası nihayet karşıma çıkmaya karar verdi demek. İmparatorluk'un son sadık oğul ve kızlarının gözlerinin içine bakmak nasıl bir duygu? Cevap verme. İçini kemiren tüm o nefreti ve hırsı görebiliyorum."

languages.text: "Endlich tritt mir {mf|der Puppenspieler|die Puppenspielerin} gegenüber. Wie fühlt es sich an, den letzten loyalen Söhnen und Töchtern des Imperiums in die Augen zu sehen? Spart Euch eine Antwort. Ich kann den Hass und die Gier sehen, die Euch von innen zerfressen."
languages.original_text: "At last, the puppet master has decided to face me. How does it feel to look into the eyes of the last loyal sons and daughters of the Imperium? Don't answer that. I can see all the hate and greed eating you up inside."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich tritt mir {mf|der Puppenspieler|die Puppenspielerin} gegenüber. Wie fühlt es sich an, den letzten loyalen Söhnen und Töchtern des Imperiums in die Augen zu sehen? Spart Euch eine Antwort. Ich kann den Hass und die Gier sehen, die Euch von innen zerfressen."
